lines.text:
[holding a shotgun]
Nearly big as my dick... nearly big as my dick... and twice as fucking hard!
He was worth ten of you. You will serve ten years.

[to Alex]
Where is it... where's the wisecrack?
Checking she's awake doesn't constitute foreplay.
[Gary swings the shotgun at Alex's head. Alex ducks, and Gary kills Tess by mistake]
There was a woman. She liked cocaine.
